participant_1.background:
I want to live in a safe neighborhood with good schools, so my daughter and grandchildren can grow up happy and healthy.
My family is my everything.
i love sports , but rugby is my favorite.
i am allergic to seafood.
I am retired and enjoy spending time with my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I bought a soccer ball with my first paycheck.
My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites.
i like rap music.
i m allergic to apples yet still eat them.
my mother raised me by herself while working two jobs.

content.text: Hello there how are you doing today?
Hello there! I am doing well. How about you?
I am doing well thank you!
That is great to hear! Do you have any interesting hobbies?
Well, I am retired and I enjoy spending time with my family and friends. I love watching rugby and I am allergic to seafood.
That is really nice. I am a huge soccer fan myself. I also love rap music and I am allergic to apples, but I still eat them.
That is so cool! I have never been a huge soccer fan, but I do enjoy watching it from time to time. What is your favorite soccer team?
My favorite team is the Portland Timbers. I am from Portland, Oregon and they are the local team.
I have heard of them. They are a pretty good team. What is your favorite rap group?
My favorite rap group is Run-DMC. They are one of the pioneers of hip-hop and they have some great songs.
I have heard of them as well. They are a classic hip-hop group. What are some of your favorite songs by them?
Some of my favorite songs by them are "It's Tricky", "Walk This Way", and "King of Rock".
Those are some great songs! I love Run-DMC.
Me too! They are one of the best rap groups of all time.
I agree! They are definitely one of my favorites as well.
